name: Random Blacksmith Game (itch)
description:
Jump into a fictionalized and dramatized medieval village as the village's blacksmith. This is an ongoing project that I will be working on and improving over time. In it's current state there isn't much other than the core mechanics and visuals but overtime everything will expand into a unique and fun experience. Please leave your feedback in the comments and/or feature you would like to see added to the game. All feedback, negative and positive, is welcomed!

  • v3.1.21
    • Core mechanics introduced.

Controls

  • WSAD - Movement
  • Space - Interact
  • ESC - Pause

Hints

  • When starting a new game, make sure you have enough ingots before opening your store.
  • Don't forget to press the "Open" box at the store's entrance to let villagers know your ready for business.
  • Closing your store while you have a full line of customers can greatly impact your store's rating.
  • The higher your store's rating, the more customers you'll attract.
  • Don't steal! Just drop the coins in the box!
  • Always use a storage crate to store your money when going to the craftsman's shop for more handles.
  • You can make weapons ahead of time and line them up at your door, that way customers will come in and buy it on the spot without much interaction.
